# deliver(_:)

**Instance Method**

Deliver the specified user notification.

## Declaration

```swift
func deliver(_ notification: NSUserNotification)
```

## Parameters

- **notification**: The user notification.

## Discussion

The notification will be presented to the user (subject to the user’s preferences). The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserNotification/isPresented] property of the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserNotification] object will always be set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if a notification is delivered using this method.

## Related Documentation

- **removeScheduledNotification(_:)**: Removes the specified user notification for the scheduled notifications.

## Managing the Delivered Notifications

- **deliveredNotifications**: An array of all user notifications delivered to the notification center.
- **removeDeliveredNotification(_:)**: Remove a delivered user notification from the user notification center.
- **removeAllDeliveredNotifications()**: Remove all delivered user notifications from the user notification center.
